most_active_tickets.title: Home and End Keyboard Keys do not scroll to beginning and end of prompt in Visual Studio Extension

common_issues.title: Login and Navigation Issues in Desktop Applications
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing problems with login functionality and navigation within Pieces OS and the Pieces VS Code extension.  One user reported being unable to sign in, while another found that Home/End keys don't work as expected in the Copilot window.  Check for conflicts with existing VS shortcuts and ensure proper functionality of login services.

related_issues.title: authentification
related_issues.text:
authentification
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [ ] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

4.3.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

"sign in to continue" and doesnt let me sign in to .. anything.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Home and End Keyboard Keys do not scroll to beginning and end of prompt in Visual Studio Extension
related_issues.text:
Home and End Keyboard Keys do not scroll to beginning and end of prompt in Visual Studio Extension
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Visual Studio

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

5.0.0.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

When writing a prompt in the Pieces Copilot window, Home and End keys change the active window in Visual Studio instead of scrolling to the beginning and text of the current line.

When I try the same in GitHub Copilot, it correctly scrolls, which suggest this is specific to Pieces and not a misconfigured VS shortcut.

This is annoying because I use these keys a lot. 

Thank you.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7666071d-e62f-446d-8876-750d1de19953)
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Prioritize resolving login issues in the Desktop Application and Pieces OS to ensure user access.
Investigate and address the navigation bug within the Pieces VS Code extension, specifically the malfunctioning Home/End keys, considering potential conflicts with VS shortcuts.
Allocate resources to promptly address the reported authentication and navigation issues to mitigate user frustration and improve overall user experience.
